projects.title: Coronaut
projects.description: An online platform for collaborative research and curating links. It s like GitHub for knowledge.

projects.title: Streama
projects.description: A writing app dedicated to stream of consciousness writing, reflection, and continuous input.

projects.title: Physics ToolBox
projects.description: Mobile app for visualizing magnetic fields in augmented reality, in collaboration with Vieyra Software and MIT Education Arcade.

experience.description: Leading UI, UX, interaction, and visual design for Replit: a collaborative, browser based coding platform used by over 3 million people. Splitting my time between design and frontend engineering.
Worked with Lifelong Kindergarten on Scratch, the worlds leading coding platform for kids. Prototyped new Scratch blocks and machine learning models to make brainstorming easier.
Led design and engineering on Matrio, a visual platform for developing serverless backends and APIs. Developed in the Harvard Innovation Lab Venture Incubation Program.
Created data visualizations to analyze collaboration while learning new tasks. Analyzed multimodal data from transcripts, motion tracking, electrodermal activity, and eye tracking.
Created cyber attack data visualizations for IBM Security. Led design, development, and user research in a mixed business, marketing, and engineering team.
